mapper.insert: insert into LAB_PCR_SAMPLE (ID, PCR_ID, SAMPLE_ID, STANDARD_FLAG, PCR_STRING, SAMPLE_POSTION, CREATE_PERSON, CREATE_DATETIME, UPDATE_PERSON, UPDATE_DATETIME, PRIMER, BUFFER, TAQE, TEMPLATE, H2O, MGCL2, DNTP) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pcrId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sampleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{standardFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pcrString,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{samplePostion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatePerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{primer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{buffer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taqe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{template,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{h2o,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mgcl2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dntp,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update LAB_PCR_SAMPLE set PCR_ID = #{pcrId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SAMPLE_ID = #{sampleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STANDARD_FLAG = #{standardFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PCR_STRING = #{pcrString,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SAMPLE_POSTION = #{samplePostion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_PERSON = #{createPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_DATETIME = #{createDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_PERSON = #{updatePerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_DATETIME = #{updateDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, PRIMER = #{primer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BUFFER = #{buffer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TAQE = #{taqe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TEMPLATE = #{template,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, H2O = #{h2o,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MGCL2 = #{mgcl2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DNTP = #{dntp,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select lps.* from LAB_PCR_SAMPLE lps left join LIMS_SAMPLE_INFO_DNA lsid on lsid.SAMPLE_ID = lps.SAMPLE_ID where 1=1 and lsid.delete_flag = '0'

select lps.*, lsid.CASE_ID as caseId, lsid.SAMPLE_NO as sampleNo, lsid.SAMPLE_NAME as sampleName, lsid.SAMPLE_TYPE as sampleType, lsid.case_id as caseId from LAB_PCR_SAMPLE lps left join LIMS_SAMPLE_INFO_DNA lsid on lsid.SAMPLE_ID = lps.SAMPLE_ID where lps.PCR_ID = #{pcrId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and lsid.delete_flag = '0' and (lsid.SAMPLE_STATUS = '02' or lsid.SAMPLE_STATUS = '03') order by lsid.SAMPLE_FLAG asc, lsid.SAMPLE_NO asc

select lps.*, lsid.SAMPLE_NO as sampleNo, lsid.SAMPLE_NAME as sampleName, lsid.SAMPLE_TYPE as sampleType from LAB_PCR_SAMPLE lps left join LIMS_SAMPLE_INFO_DNA lsid on lsid.SAMPLE_ID = lps.SAMPLE_ID WHERE lps.SAMPLE_ID = #{sampleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY lps.CREATE_DATETIME DESC
